data.title: Blue Star Infotech, QlikTech Tie Up For BI
data.meta_description: Will offer collaborative business intelligence solutions in India.
data.text:
Blue Star Infotech Ltd (BSIL), a global provider of software solutions, announced that it has entered into a partnership with QlikTech , a provider of user driven business intelligence (BI) software. BSIL will deliver solutions based on QlikTechâs business discovery platform QlikView. Through this partnership, QlikTech will gain access to BSILâs BI implementation experience and presence in the domestic market, especially in the manufacturing and media & entertainment verticals whereas BSIL will be able to offer customers tailored collaborative, analytical reporting solutions enabling them to take better informed decisions.

“We are delighted to partner with Blue Star Infotech and are confident that its vast reach and experience in implementing BI solutions will help us grow in the Indian enterprise market space, which has a huge potential for collaborative BI solutions with simple and straightforward user interfaces. BSIL customers will now be able to effectively unlock their enterprise data value and respond better and faster in an increasingly competitive marketplace,” said Ramendra Mandal, Country Manager, Qliktech India Pvt. Ltd.

“The rapid growth in the Indian enterprise market is resulting in huge amounts of transactional data being generated. Enterprises need accurate and timely information insights that enable faster, and more informed business decisions. However, traditional BI solutions require higher investments and have an extended learning and deployment curve making them unappealing to enterprises,” said Sunil Bhatia, CEO & MD, Blue Star Infotech Ltd.

“QlikViewâs patented in-memory technology, for the first time, brings social and collaborative capabilities to BI solutions that not only empower enterprise users but also provide a better operational control. Our solution can seamlessly integrate with the mobile platform as well, which is a rapidly growing opportunity,” added Ramendra Mandal.
